setting.location: Research laboratory aboard station orbiting planet Solaris
setting.weather: Artificial atmosphere with increased ventilation from stress

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair disheveled, face showing manic determination mixed with deep fear
characters.clothing: Lab coat over wrinkled station uniform, sleeves rolled up frantically
characters.position: Hunched over multiple analysis stations, moving rapidly between equipment
characters.action: Frantically running tests and measurements, hands shaking as he operates complex scientific instruments, desperate to find rational explanation

characters.appearance: Woman, late 20s, dark hair, sitting calmly despite being subject of intensive scientific study
characters.clothing: Simple dress, completely relaxed despite clinical examination
characters.position: Seated on examination chair, allowing tests with supernatural patience
characters.action: Remaining perfectly still for measurements, showing no discomfort or concern about being studied like a specimen

scene.mainElements: Advanced laboratory filled with humming analysis equipment, multiple screens showing impossible readings, scientific instruments arranged for comprehensive study
scene.details: Computer screens displaying contradictory data, scientific instruments giving readings that make no sense, scattered research notes with crossed-out calculations, coffee cups forgotten as work becomes obsessive, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Laboratory extends to show additional equipment stations, complex technological environment providing false sense of control, station architecture emphasizing isolation from normal world
scene.atmosphere: Manic desperation disguised as scientific method, rational mind breaking down while clinging to familiar procedures, growing realization that science cannot explain the impossible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium wide shot showing frantic scientist and calm subject
composition.focus: Contrast between human desperation and supernatural calm acceptance
composition.depth: Frantic character with equipment in foreground, calm subject in middle ground, laboratory complexity extending into background

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
